hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Iron Boots#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Deku Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Forest Trial Frozen Eye Switch Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Morpha#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Goron Mask# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.
